      • parsedMinutes

        private java.lang.String parsedMinutes(java.lang.String time)
        Converts the string time in seconds to a string representing the same time in minutes
        Parameters:
        time - The total number of seconds
        Returns:
        The number of whole minutes that is represented by time

      • parsedSeconds

        private java.lang.String parsedSeconds(java.lang.String time)
        Converts the string time in total seconds to a string representing the same time in seconds after removing the whole minutes
        Parameters:
        time - The total number of seconds
        Returns:
        The number seconds over the minutes this string represents
